column3: Latest;Siem Reap: According to preliminary information from the Siem Reap provincial authorities
column4: a ------70-year-old Hungarian man ------suspected of contracting COVID-19 has been found in Siem Reap.------The man
column5: who was traveling from France via South Korea
column8: and his test results at the time were negative for the coronavirus. He was then isolated at his residence in Siem Reap until September 25
column9: 2020. A re-examination showed suspicious results and his specimen was sent (arrived at around 11:00 pm on September 25
column10: 2020) for analysis at the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge
column11: Phnom Penh. The test will be done on the morning of September 26
column13: and the results are expected to be available in the evening.------While  waiting for the analysis from the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge
column15: the Siem Reap Provincial Health Department could not contact the man
column16: and warned he had escaped from his place above and disappeared. ------KBN------*More details expected later
